workshoptitle: Autonomous Graph Database: Load CSV files, create a graph, and query and visualize it

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Loading data from CSV files and creating a graph.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Load CSV files into the Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Query and visualize the graph
